front.title: Signaled Telephony Events in the Session Initiation Protocol(SIP)

abstract.t: This document demonstrates a way for interested SIP User Agents whichare not a party to the media of a call or session, to receive SIPevent notifications when signaled digits, or other specifictelephony-related events are detected. This is useful for a varietyof applications that monitor calls for a specific event (e.g.: a longpound, special sequence of digits, or a fax signal) and--only then--take an active role in the monitored calls.
